message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $120 is a bit steep for me.  I'm really interested in this product, but I'm only able to pay $85 right now.  What do you think?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand that $85 is a bit lower than what I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer you the product for $100. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it!
